channel.title: Finextra Research Headlines
channel.description: The Latest Financial IT News Headlines

item.title: NGN 2023: Nordic interoperability advantageous, yet remains challenging
item.description: NextGen Nordics will return to Stockholm on 25 April 2023, and we will be welcoming a range of speakers who will discuss topics such as P27, cross border payments, open banking, BNPL, CBDCs, digital assets and Web 3.0.

item.title: Google bans personal loan apps from accessing user contacts
item.description: Google is banning Android apps offering personal loans from accessing users' sensitive data, such as photos and contacts.

item.title: EBAday 2023: Agenda now live!
item.description: EBAday, the annual event for payments and transaction banking executives, will return on 20th – 21st June 2023 at IFEMA in Madrid, Spain.

item.title: Welcome to BloombergGPT, a large-scale language model built for finance
item.description: Market data giant Bloomberg is set to capitalise on the craze for all things AI by building a 50-billion parameter large language model for finance, dubbed BloombergGPT.

item.title: Soft Space raises largest Series B by a Malaysian startup
item.description: Malaysian SoftPOS player Soft Space has completed a $31.5 million Series B1 funding to expand its global footprint and widen its customer base.

item.title: Portrait Analytics raises $3m for generative AI investment research platform
item.description: Portrait Analytics, the startup behind a generative AI research platform for investment analysts, has raised $3 million in pre-seed funding led by .406 Ventures.

item.title: FinFit and Salary Finance US merge
item.description: FinFit is merging with Salary Finance US, a fintech focused on salary-linked savings and loans for employees, creating a workplace financial platform serving over 10 million US workers. Financial terms were not disclosed.

item.title: Cybercrime marketplace shut down
item.description: One of the world's biggest online marketplaces selling stolen credentials has been shut down following an operation involving a host of law enforcement agencies.

item.title: Santander and Microsoft launch AI challenge
item.description: Banco Santander has teamed up with Microsoft and the Oxentia Foundation on a global challenge for entrepreneurs using AI to make a "positive impact on society".

item.title: Cash App founder Bob Lee killed in stabbing
item.description: Bob Lee, the founder of the Cash App and a former chief technology officer at Square died on Tuesday after he was stabbed in San Francisco.

item.title: Mastercard makes sustainable cards pledge
item.description: Mastercard is stepping up its sustainability efforts, vowing to ditch all first-use PVC plastics from its newly produced cards by the beginning of 2028.

item.title: NextGen Nordics 2023: Cross-border payments reinforces sovereignty
item.description: NextGen Nordics will return to Stockholm on 25 April 2023, and we will be welcoming a range of speakers who will discuss topics such as P27, cross border payments, open banking, BNPL, CBDCs, digital assets and Web 3.0.

item.title: Experian selects AWS as preferred cloud provider
item.description: Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS), an Amazon.com, Inc. company AMZN, today announced that Experian EXPN, the leading global information services company and credit reporting bureau, has named AWS as its preferred cloud provider to power its multiyear information technology (IT) modernization initiative.

item.title: Triodos Bank’s 2035 emission reduction targets validated as science-based
item.description: The Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) has validated Triodos Bank’s near-term emission reduction targets to achieve net-zero in 2035 as being science-based.

item.title: Clausematch forges first Middle East partnership with Varri Consultancy
item.description: Clausematch, a technology company developing solutions for regulatory compliance, is pleased to announce it has signed an agreement with Várri Consultancy, an independent management consulting boutique specialising in strategy, risk and governance advisory.

item.title: BNP Paribas selects Worldline to reduce Iban fraud in Sepa Direct Debits
item.description: BNP Paribas Cash Management has selected Worldline (Euronext: WLN), a global leader in payments services, to reduce fraud in SEPA Direct Debit transactions.

item.title: Ralph Lauren now accepts crypto payments at Miami Design District store
item.description: BitPay is excited to announce Ralph Lauren, the brand that defines modern luxury and timeless style, accepts cryptocurrency payments at its new store in the Miami Design District.

item.title: Bybit introduces AI tool to personalise crypto investing
item.description: Bybit, the world’s third most visited crypto exchange, is proud to announce the launch of its new AI program: Tools Discovery.

item.title: Cardstream delivers white label PayFac-as-a-Service offering
item.description: Cardstream Group, which operates Europe’s fastest growing independent white label Payment Gateway, has announced the arrival of its significant new white label PayFac-as-a-Service to the market.

item.title: CoreChain debuts direct-to-customer payments automation product
item.description: CoreChain Technologies, the first embedded B2B payments network built on distributed ledger technology, today announced the launch of its direct-to-customer payments automation product, CoreChain Pay.

item.title: Post Finance moves into crypto space with Sygnum support
item.description: PostFinance, one of Switzerland’s leading financial institutions and largest retail banks, partners with Sygnum, the world’s first digital asset bank, to offer its customers a range of regulated digital asset banking services via Sygnum's B2B banking platform.

item.title: Akuvo closes $10 million investment round
item.description: AKUVO, a technology organization specializing in collections and credit risk, has announced a new round of funding.

item.title: Mena Fintech Association appoints Bryan Zhang to advisory board
item.description: As the MENA Fintech Association continues to further carve out its place in the dynamic and ever-evolving world of fintech, the organization is thrilled to welcome Bryan Zhang to its Advisory Board (Academic). With his extensive background in researching financial and regulatory innovation globally, Bryan's appointment is set to provide a fresh perspective on the fintech industry in the MENA region.

item.title: Skaleet links core banking platform to Amlyze financial crime kit
item.description: AMLYZE, a fast-developing RegTech startup that helps fintechs, banks, crypto businesses and other regulated entities fight financial crime and avoid painful regulatory fines, and Skaleet, an international fintech offering a next-generation Core Banking Platform (CBP), have established a new partnership.

item.title: Top payment trends for merchants & keeping conversation rates healthy
item.description: Speaking at MPE 2023, Tobias Hilpert, Head of Customer Success, ACI, and Jóhannes Kolbeinsson, Co-Founder and CEO, PAYSTRAX, discuss the payment trends for merchants this year, some of the challenges they might face and how to keep conversion rates healthy.

item.title: How is digital transformation changing e-commerce?
item.description: Speaking at Merchant Payments Ecosystem 2023, Giulio de Taddeo, SVP Retail, Petrol, EV Charging, Utilities & Telco, Nexi Group, discusses real-time developments and consumer benefits found in e-commerce.

item.title: Why is 3DS adoption important for merchants?
item.description: Speaking at Merchant Payments Ecosystem 2023, Ivan Vukelikj, Senior Product Manager Secure Digital Payments, Netcetera, discusses how the adoption of 3DS will contribute to the improvement of digital payment services.

item.title: Open Banking adoption: How far have we come?
item.description: Speaking at Merchant Payments Ecosystem 2023, Olof Wirfelt, Chief Commercial Officer, Trustly, discusses Open Banking and technology adoption.

item.title: The impact of Open Banking and Embedded Finance on customer experience
item.description: Speaking at Merchant Payments Ecosystem 2023, Octavian Puzderca, Senior Principal, Advisors Client Services, Mastercard, and Katharina Luschnik, Vice President, Product Sales, Aiia, a Mastercard company, discuss the impact of Open Banking payments and Embedded Finance on the digital customer experience.

item.title: What does an agile product owner do?
item.description: Piers Barton, VP of Product, RTGS Group Technologies, speaks with Andrew Smith, RTGS.global in FinextraTV’s Tech Uncovered Series, about the challenges that financial services face when adopting a true product-driven approach.

item.title: The emergence of risk orchestration technology
item.description: Speaking at Trust:Live 2023, LexisNexis® Risk Solutions Market Planning Director, Chris Foye, discusses how risk orchestration technology is transforming the way in which organisations evaluate and build digital trust with their customers.

item.title: The impact of AI in compliance and risk management
item.description: Speaking in Finextra’s PREDICT 2023 Series, Richard Dupree, CEO and Founder, Riskliance, shares his forecast for AI's involvement in the risk landscape.

item.title: The advantages of behavioural biometrics
item.description: Speaking at Trust:Live 2023, Chief Architect of LexisNexis® BehavioSec™, Neil Costigan and LexisNexis® Risk Solutions Director of Market Planning, Fraud & Identity, Rob Woods, discuss why behavioural biometrics are important in building digital trust with online users and how this technology is evolving to meet emerging online threats.

item.title: Keeping up with digital transformation
item.description: Speaking at Trust:Live 2023, LexisNexis® Risk Solutions Business Services UK & Ireland Managing Director, Steve Elliot, offers a comprehensive look at customer interactions in the digital space and what this means for business going forward.

item.title: What payment trends we can expect in 2023?
item.description:
In this episode of FinextraTV's PREDICT 2023 Series, Dalbir Sahota, Senior Director Product Management, Bankers Almanac® at LexisNexis® Risk Solutions, shares his forecast for cross-border payments and APIs.
For more information on the research cited, please visit:

item.title: Building the future landscape of digital trust
item.description: Speaking at LexisNexis® Risk Solutions Trust:Live 2023, Louise French, Strategy Director, The Future Laboratory, discusses the future landscape of digital trust and initial research on the formation of "The Authentaverse."

item.title: Where are the female tech leaders?
item.description: Speaking at LexisNexis® Risk Solutions Trust:Live 2023, Lauren Ingram, Founder, Women of Web3, discusses women in tech and what qualities are necessary for the next generation of tech leaders.

item.title: ISO 20022 evolution: How to ensure interoperability
item.description: Watch this webinar, in association with FIS Global, exploring how the standardisation of ISO 20022 is evolving and how payment systems and financial institutions are keeping up with the transformation.

item.title: Payments modernisation: how banks are hitting refresh
item.description: Watch this webinar to learn how banks make decisions around when modernising payments processes.

item.title: Real-time payments: How banks and FIs can win competitive advantage
item.description: Watch this webinar on how financial institutions are leveraging real-time payments to stand out against emerging competitors.

item.title: Fintech vs. Banking: Who will win the deposit war?
item.description: Watch this webinar on how traditional banks should ‘remix’ their portfolio and partner with fintech firms to deliver refined services.

item.title: Fintech vs. Banking: Who will win the deposit war?
item.description: Watch this webinar on how traditional banks should ‘remix’ their portfolio and partner with fintech firms to deliver refined services.

item.description: Navigating complex, overlapping sanctions is placing renewed pressure on banks’ compliance operation...

item.description: As the business world continues to evolve, small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) are embracing ne...
